tagline: Making bank from your tweets since 2012
body:
### CS 472/572 Term Project, Fall 2012
This page details our approach of using machine learning for sentiment analysis of Twitter to make buy-sell-hold decisions in the stock market.


To check out the code with git.
```
$ git clone git@github.com:curtisullerich/twittertrader.git
```
Create a web page for your project, including a brief summary of the goals of the project, the basic approach to be followed, and anticipated results along with the relevant bibliography, and email the URL to the instructor and the TA by November 09, 2012.

### Students
Daniel Stiner, senior, Computer Engineering (@danstiner)
Brandon Maxwell, junior, Computer Science (@bmaxwell921)
Curtis Ullerich, senior, Computer Engineering (@curtisullerich)
